text:
WHY THE TULSA RALLY IS DANGEROUS

1⃣ It's indoors.
2⃣ It'll last hours.
3⃣ Many attendees don't believe in mask-wearing.
4⃣ Attendees can't socially distance due to seating.
5⃣ Attendees are stationary.
6⃣ They'll be shouting.
7⃣ Many are in at-risk groups.
8⃣ Tulsa is a hotspot.
